QuestData.Title: Gorgrom the Dragon-Eater
QuestData.Description: We must show the ogres that we are not to be trifled with. We must send a message.$b$bTravel to Boulder'mok and kill the ogres there. Make sure you keep their heads.$b$bThen go to Gorgrom's altar and place the trap there for him. Gorgrom will appear, and you must lure him into the trap. When he is dead, mount your grisly totems near his corpse, so that the ogres may look at their fallen master and their fallen brothers, and know the price for seeking to destroy us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 3 Grisly Totems from Boulder'mok ogres. Then, use Sablemane's Trap at Gorgrom's Altar to summon and kill Gorgrom the Dragon-Eater.$b$bWhen Gorgrom is dead, place the 3 Grisly Totems near his corpse.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. Well done!$b$bI suspect we will hear little more from the ogres and their master.
